articles.author: HT Entertainment Desk
articles.title: Virat Kohli sings and grooves to Shah Rukh Khan's Chaleya during India vs SA - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Virat Kohli, who scored his 49th ODI century during the India vs South Africa match, turned 35 on Sunday. He was seen grooving to Shah Rukh Khan's Jawan song. | Bollywood
articles.content: It's clearly Virat Kohli's day. After scoring his historic 49th ODI century on his 35th birthday, the cricketer has now professed his love for Shah Rukh Khan during the India vs South Africa World Cu… [+2224 chars]
